argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumunsnd.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumunsnd.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsumunsnd.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 4 |  | gsumunsnd.a | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 5 |  | gsumunsnd.f | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | gsumunsnd.m | |- ( ph -> M e. V ) |
| 7 |  | gsumunsnd.d | |- ( ph -> -. M e. A ) |
| 8 |  | gsumunsnd.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 9 |  | gsumunsnd.s | |- ( ( ph /\ k = M ) -> X = Y ) |
| 10 |  | gsumunsnfd.0 | |- F/_ k Y |
| 11 |  | #P_snfi | |- { M } e. Fin |
| 12 |  | #P_unfi | |- ( ( A e. Fin /\ { M } e. Fin ) -> ( A u. { M } ) e. Fin ) |
| 13 | 4, 11, 12 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ph -> ( A u. { M } ) e. Fin ) |
| 14 |  | #P_elun | |- ( k e. ( A u. { M } ) <-> ( k e. A \/ k e. { M } ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_elsni | |- ( k e. { M } -> k = M ) |
| 16 | 15, 9 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. { M } ) -> X = Y ) |
| 17 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. { M } ) -> Y e. B ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. { M } ) -> X e. B ) |
| 19 | 5, 18 | #P_jaodan | |- ( ( ph /\ ( k e. A \/ k e. { M } ) ) -> X e. B ) |
| 20 | 14, 19 | #P_sylan2b | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A u. { M } ) ) -> X e. B ) |
| 21 |  | #P_disjsn | |- ( ( A i^i { M } ) = (/) <-> -. M e. A ) |
| 22 | 7, 21 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ph -> ( A i^i { M } ) = (/) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( A u. { M } ) = ( A u. { M } ) ) |
| 24 | 1, 2, 3, 13, 20, 22, 23 | #P_gsummptfidmsplit | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. ( A u. { M } ) |-> X ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( k e. { M } |-> X ) ) ) ) |
| 25 |  | #P_cmnmnd | |- ( G e. CMnd -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 26 | 3, 25 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 27 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ k ph |
| 28 | 1, 26, 6, 8, 9, 27, 10 | #P_gsumsnfd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. { M } |-> X ) ) = Y ) |
| 29 | 28 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( k e. { M } |-> X ) ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) .+ Y ) ) |
| 30 | 24, 29 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. ( A u. { M } ) |-> X ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) .+ Y ) ) |
